Title.evidence: The randomized phase III POST trial aimed to compare the efficacies of two adjuvant S-1-based doublet chemotherapies

Trial_Design.evidence: The randomized phase III POST trial aimed to compare the efficacies of two adjuvant S-1-based doublet chemotherapies

Intervention.evidence: compare the efficacies of two adjuvant S-1-based doublet chemotherapies: S-1 plus cisplatin (SP) and S-1 plus docetaxel (DS)

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to validate the nProfiler1 assay using a distinct cohort from the POST trial.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Disease-free survival (DFS) and overall survival (OS), including 5-year survival rates, were calculated for the enrolled patients.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of the 153 patients in the POST trial, 118 were included in the post-hoc analysis.

Result_Outcome.evidence: no significant difference in DFS or OS was observed between the SP and DS groups.
